definition: ancient meaning/original or etymological meaning of a word
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: 《Book of Changes》and the great thinkers of the pre-Qin period emphasize the ancient and contemporary significances.
sentences.chinese: 《周易》及先秦时代的重要思想家都注重古义和今义。

definition: phonetic loan character/using one character interchangeably for phonetically related characters
phonetic loan character/using one character interchangeably for phonetically related characters
structural particle, such as 的[de5], 地[de5], 得[de5] and 所[suo3]
can be compared to/is the same as
loan character (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/character acquiring meanings by phonetic association/also called phonetic loan
the meaning of a phonetic loan character 假借字[jia3 jie4 zi4] acquired from a similar-sounding word (e.g. 而[er2] originally meant "beard" but acquired the meaning "and")
the meaning of sth/an explanation of the meaning of words or phrases/definition/an interpretation (of doctrine)/religious doctrine
see 說文解字|说文解字[Shuo1 wen2 Jie3 zi4]
